1392950.name: VIETNAM WAR PLATOON 越战排 Demo
1392950.description:
This game is a new concept card and flag game with the theme of Vietnam War. It is a light snack game prepared for the leisure transition of players who are tired of playing large-scale games like me and hand injured players.

The demo version only provides one mode, only 1 round, no archive function, no story template, no difficulty options, weapons only basic weapons, and no random map system.

Live broadcast room of game producers http://live.bilibili.com/5365754

Other content, Personal Free Multiplayer MOD Game Download
https://42amsterdam.net/samforum/showthread.php?t=2342

本游戏是一款以越南战争为主题的新概念牌旗游戏。这是一款轻松休闲的零食游戏，专为那些厌倦了玩大型游戏的玩家和手受伤的玩家准备的休闲过渡游戏。

演示版只提供一种模式，只有一轮，没有存档功能，没有故事模板，没有难度选项，武器只有基础武器，没有随机地图系统。

游戏制作人直播室http://live.bilibili.com/5365754
